abstracts.cdata!:
The Tax Administration Technical
            Assistance Loan Project aims to increase the efficiency of
            the Directorate of Tax Administration (DGI) and consequently
            to improve the tax contribution to Government finances. The
            project will consist of six components: (i) a computerized
            tax surveillance system of the 2000 largest taxpayers; (ii)
            a 50 percent increase in the number of DGI tax inspectors,
            and the recruitment of computer analysts and programmers;
            (iii) training for the new staff; and (iv) a review of the
            internal auditing and control procedures. Further to this,
            the project will provide for: (v) a revision of the current
            techniques for the inspection of taxpayers; and (vi) the
            provision of personal and multiuser computer equipment.
